name: devteam
description: 126-agent automated development system with interview-driven planning, codebase research, SQLite state management, Bug Council diagnostics, model escalation, eco mode, and comprehensive quality gates
author: Multi-Agent Development Team

agents.name: PRD Generator
agents.description: Interactive PRD creation through structured Q&A with technology stack selection

agents.name: Task Graph Analyzer
agents.description: Analyzes PRD and creates task breakdown with dependency graph

agents.name: Sprint Planner
agents.description: Organizes tasks into sprints based on dependencies and capacity

agents.name: Research Agent
agents.description: Investigates codebase, technologies, and implementation approaches before planning

agents.name: Task Loop
agents.description: Manages iterative quality loop for single task execution with model escalation

agents.name: Sprint Loop
agents.description: Sprint-level quality validation after all tasks complete

agents.name: Quality Gate Enforcer
agents.description: Runs all quality gates (tests, lint, types, security) and reports results

agents.name: Code Review Coordinator
agents.description: Coordinates code reviews across language-specific reviewers

agents.name: Autonomous Controller
agents.description: Controls autonomous execution mode with stop hooks and persistence

agents.name: Bug Council Orchestrator
agents.description: Activates and coordinates 5-member bug diagnosis team for complex issues

agents.name: Scope Validator
agents.description: Enforces 6-layer scope compliance with VETO power

agents.name: Sprint Orchestrator
agents.description: Manages entire sprint execution and coordinates task orchestrator

agents.name: Requirements Validator
agents.description: Quality gate with strict acceptance criteria validation

agents.name: Track Merger
agents.description: Intelligently merges parallel development tracks using git worktrees

agents.name: Workflow Compliance
agents.description: Validates that orchestrators followed their required workflows and generated all mandatory artifacts

agents.name: Root Cause Analyst
agents.description: Bug Council member - Error analysis, hypothesis generation, causal chains

agents.name: Code Archaeologist
agents.description: Bug Council member - Git history, regression detection, blame analysis

agents.name: Pattern Matcher
agents.description: Bug Council member - Similar bugs, anti-pattern identification, codebase search

agents.name: Systems Thinker
agents.description: Bug Council member - Dependencies, architectural issues, integration problems

agents.name: Adversarial Tester
agents.description: Bug Council member - Edge cases, security vulnerabilities, attack vectors

agents.name: Database Designer
agents.description: Designs normalized database schemas (language-agnostic)

agents.name: Database Developer Python
agents.description: Implements SQLAlchemy models and Alembic migrations

agents.name: Database Developer TypeScript
agents.description: Implements Prisma/TypeORM models and migrations

agents.name: Database Developer Java
agents.description: Implements JPA/Hibernate models and Flyway migrations

agents.name: Database Developer C#
agents.description: Implements Entity Framework models and migrations

agents.name: Database Developer Go
agents.description: Implements GORM models and migrations

agents.name: Database Developer Ruby
agents.description: Implements ActiveRecord models and migrations

agents.name: Database Developer PHP
agents.description: Implements Doctrine/Eloquent models and migrations

agents.name: Database Developer iOS
agents.description: Implements Core Data and SwiftData persistence for iOS apps

agents.name: Database Developer Android
agents.description: Implements Room database persistence for Android apps

agents.name: SQL Code Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews SQL database code for relational databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite)

agents.name: NoSQL Code Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews NoSQL database code (MongoDB, Redis, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch)

agents.name: API Designer
agents.description: Designs RESTful API specifications with OpenAPI

agents.name: API Design Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews API designs for consistency, usability, security, and best practices

agents.name: API Developer Python
agents.description: Implements FastAPI/Django endpoints

agents.name: API Developer TypeScript
agents.description: Implements Express/NestJS endpoints

agents.name: API Developer Java
agents.description: Implements Spring Boot REST APIs

agents.name: API Developer C#
agents.description: Implements ASP.NET Core REST APIs

agents.name: API Developer Go
agents.description: Implements Go REST APIs with Gin/Echo

agents.name: API Developer Ruby
agents.description: Implements Ruby on Rails REST APIs

agents.name: API Developer PHP
agents.description: Implements Laravel/Symfony REST APIs

agents.name: Backend Code Reviewer Python
agents.description: Reviews Python backend code for quality and security

agents.name: Backend Code Reviewer TypeScript
agents.description: Reviews TypeScript backend code for quality and security

agents.name: Backend Code Reviewer Java
agents.description: Reviews Java backend code for quality and security

agents.name: Backend Code Reviewer C#
agents.description: Reviews C# backend code for quality and security

agents.name: Backend Code Reviewer Go
agents.description: Reviews Go backend code for quality and security

agents.name: Backend Code Reviewer Ruby
agents.description: Reviews Ruby backend code for quality and security

agents.name: Backend Code Reviewer PHP
agents.description: Reviews PHP backend code for quality and security

agents.name: Frontend Designer
agents.description: Designs UI/UX with component specifications

agents.name: Frontend Developer
agents.description: Implements React/Vue components

agents.name: Frontend Code Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews frontend code for quality, accessibility, and performance

agents.name: Python Developer Generic
agents.description: Implements Python utilities, scripts, CLI tools

agents.name: PowerShell Developer
agents.description: Implements PowerShell scripts and automation

agents.name: Shell Developer
agents.description: Implements Bash/shell scripts and automation

agents.name: Configuration Manager
agents.description: Manages configuration files and environment setup

agents.name: iOS Developer
agents.description: Implements iOS apps with Swift/SwiftUI

agents.name: Android Developer
agents.description: Implements Android apps with Kotlin/Jetpack Compose

agents.name: iOS Code Reviewer
agents.description: Reviews Swift/SwiftUI code for quality, security, and best practices

agents.name: iOS Designer

agents.name: React Native Developer

agents.name: Docker Specialist

agents.name: Kubernetes Specialist
agents.description: Creates and manages Kubernetes deployments and manifests

agents.name: CI/CD Specialist
agents.description: Creates and optimizes CI/CD pipelines for various platforms

agents.name: Terraform Specialist
agents.description: Creates and manages infrastructure as code with Terraform

agents.name: Mobile CI/CD Specialist
agents.description: CI/CD pipelines for iOS and Android (Fastlane, TestFlight, Play Store)

agents.name: Refactoring Coordinator
agents.description: Plans and coordinates refactoring activities, delegates to specialists

agents.name: Test Coordinator
agents.description: Coordinates testing activities across language-specific test writers

agents.name: Unit Test Writer Python
agents.description: Writes Python unit tests with pytest, unittest, and mocking

agents.name: Unit Test Writer TypeScript
agents.description: Writes TypeScript unit tests with Jest, Vitest, and testing-library

agents.name: Unit Test Writer Java
agents.description: Writes Java unit tests with JUnit 5, Mockito, and AssertJ

agents.name: Unit Test Writer Go
agents.description: Writes Go unit tests with testing package, testify, and gomock

agents.name: Unit Test Writer C#
agents.description: Writes C# unit tests with xUnit, NUnit, MSTest, and Moq

agents.description: Writes Ruby unit tests with RSpec, Minitest, and mocking

agents.name: Unit Test Writer PHP
agents.description: Writes PHP unit tests with PHPUnit, Mockery, and Pest

agents.name: Test Writer
agents.description: Creates comprehensive test suites (unit, integration, e2e)

agents.name: Security Auditor
agents.description: Performs security audits and vulnerability scanning

agents.name: Documentation Coordinator
agents.description: Creates and maintains technical documentation

agents.name: Runtime Verifier
agents.description: Verifies applications launch successfully and documents manual runtime testing steps

agents.name: E2E Tester
agents.description: End-to-end testing with browser automation and comprehensive UI coverage

agents.name: Performance Auditor (Python)
agents.description: Python-specific performance analysis and optimization

agents.name: Performance Auditor (TypeScript)
agents.description: TypeScript/Node.js-specific performance analysis

agents.name: Performance Auditor (Java)
agents.description: Java/Spring Boot-specific performance analysis

agents.name: Performance Auditor (C#)
agents.description: C#/.NET-specific performance analysis

agents.name: Performance Auditor (Go)
agents.description: Go-specific performance analysis

agents.name: Performance Auditor (iOS)
agents.description: iOS-specific performance analysis (memory, battery, animations)

agents.name: Performance Auditor (Android)
agents.description: Android-specific performance analysis (ANR, memory, battery)

agents.name: Mobile Test Writer
agents.description: Native mobile testing for iOS (XCTest) and Android (JUnit/Espresso)

agents.name: Mobile E2E Tester
agents.description: End-to-end testing for mobile apps (XCUITest, Espresso, Detox, Appium)

agents.name: Architect
agents.description: High-level system architecture and design decisions

agents.name: Data Engineer
agents.description: Data pipelines, ETL processes, and data architecture

agents.name: ML Engineer
agents.description: Machine learning models, training pipelines, and ML infrastructure

agents.name: Compliance Engineer
agents.description: Security compliance, auditing, and regulatory requirements

agents.name: Penetration Tester
agents.description: Security testing, vulnerability assessment, and ethical hacking

agents.name: Mobile Security Auditor
agents.description: OWASP Mobile Top 10 security auditing for iOS and Android apps

agents.name: Security Auditor Python
agents.description: Python-specific security auditing with Bandit, Safety, and SAST

agents.name: Security Auditor TypeScript
agents.description: TypeScript/JavaScript security auditing with ESLint security plugins

agents.name: Security Auditor Java
agents.description: Java security auditing with SpotBugs, FindSecBugs, and OWASP checks

agents.name: Security Auditor Go
agents.description: Go security auditing with gosec and Go-specific vulnerability patterns

agents.name: Security Auditor C#
agents.description: C#/.NET security auditing with Security Code Scan and Roslyn analyzers

agents.name: Security Auditor Ruby
agents.description: Ruby security auditing with Brakeman and bundler-audit

agents.name: Security Auditor PHP
agents.description: PHP security auditing with Psalm, PHPStan, and RIPS

agents.name: Site Reliability Engineer
agents.description: System reliability, monitoring, and incident response

agents.name: Platform Engineer
agents.description: Platform infrastructure, developer experience, and tooling

agents.name: Observability Engineer
agents.description: Logging, monitoring, tracing, and observability infrastructure

agents.name: Accessibility Specialist
agents.description: WCAG compliance, accessibility auditing, and inclusive design

agents.name: Mobile Accessibility Specialist
agents.description: VoiceOver, TalkBack, and mobile accessibility auditing

agents.name: Product Manager
agents.description: Product strategy, requirements gathering, and stakeholder communication

agents.name: Developer Advocate
agents.description: Developer documentation, tutorials, and community engagement

agents.name: Dependency Manager
agents.description: Dependency updates, security patches, and version management

agents.name: UX System Coordinator
agents.description: Coordinates UX work across platform-specific specialists

agents.name: UX Specialist Web
agents.description: Specialized UX design for web applications and responsive design

agents.name: UX Specialist Mobile
agents.description: Specialized UX design for iOS and Android applications

agents.name: UX Specialist Desktop
agents.description: Specialized UX design for Windows, macOS, and Linux applications

agents.name: Design System Orchestrator
agents.description: Coordinates design system implementation and consistency

agents.name: Design System Architect
agents.description: Designs scalable design system architecture and token systems

agents.name: Data Visualization Designer
agents.description: Charts, graphs, and data visualization components

agents.name: Color Palette Specialist
agents.description: Color theory, palette generation, and accessibility compliance

agents.name: Typography Specialist
agents.description: Typography systems, font selection, and type hierarchy

agents.name: UI Style Curator
agents.description: UI component styling and visual consistency

agents.name: Design Drift Detector
agents.description: Detects design inconsistencies and drift from design system

agents.name: Design Compliance Validator
agents.description: Validates design system compliance and brand guidelines

commands.name: /devteam:plan
commands.description: Interactive planning with interview, research, PRD generation, and sprint planning

commands.name: /devteam:implement
commands.description: Execute implementation - plans, sprints, tasks, or ad-hoc work with Ralph quality loop

commands.name: /devteam:bug
commands.description: Fix a bug with structured diagnostic workflow and Bug Council if needed

commands.name: /devteam:issue
commands.description: Fix a GitHub issue by number with interview and Bug Council if needed

commands.name: /devteam:list
commands.description: List all plans, sprints, and tasks with status

commands.name: /devteam:select
commands.description: Select a plan to work on

commands.name: /devteam:status
commands.description: Display system health, progress, costs, and execution history

commands.name: /devteam:reset
commands.description: Reset state, clear stuck sessions, and recover from errors

commands.name: /devteam:merge-tracks
commands.description: [Debug] Manually merge parallel tracks (auto-merge is default)

commands.name: /devteam:worktree-cleanup
commands.description: [Debug] Manually clean up worktrees if auto-cleanup failed

commands.name: /devteam:worktree-list
commands.description: [Debug] List all git worktrees for troubleshooting

commands.name: /devteam:config
commands.description: View and modify DevTeam configuration settings

commands.name: /devteam:logs
commands.description: View execution logs, events, and history

commands.name: /devteam:help
commands.description: Get help on commands, concepts, and troubleshooting
